title: Poster, Exhibition: Graphic Americana, Leonard L. Milberg Gallery, Princeton University Library, 1992
title_raw: Exhibition: Graphic Americana, Leonard L. Milberg Gallery, Princeton University Library
inscribed: Imprinted in white, top right of image: "This poster made possible by The Ephemera Society of America".  Imprinted in white, bottom left: "© copyright 1992 by The Ephemera Society of America/ Design: G. Smart, D. Roylance, & A. Scheuch/ Printing: Whitman Communications Group".
description:
Exhibition poster for graphic arts at Leonard L. Milberg Gallery at Princeton University.
On black background, imprinted across top: "GRAPHIC AMERICANA/ THE ART & TECHNIQUE OF PRINTED EPHEMERA/ THE LEONARD L. MILBERG GALLERY FOR THE GRAPHIC ARTS ~/ PRINCETON UNIVERSITY LIBRARY 8 MAY - 20 SEPTEMBER 1992" (in yellow).  Photographic reproduction of assembly of American graphic ephemera amassed and held together by red string nailed in square form with two diagonals.  Image includes printed fan of woman's hat, match labels, can labels, cards, business cards, etc.
Credits in white at top right of image.

tombstone.epitaph:
Poster, Exhibition: Graphic Americana, Leonard L. Milberg Gallery, Princeton University Library, 1992. Offset lithography. 
Gift of Unknown Donor. 1994-114-20.
